scripts.login: gcloud auth login && gcloud config set project my-sandbox-yannick
scripts.deploy-front: yes | gcloud run deploy frontend --source frontend/ --project my-sandbox-yannick --region europe-west9
scripts.deploy-back: yes | gcloud run deploy backend --source backend/ --project my-sandbox-yannick --region europe-west9
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-back && npm run deploy-front
